column4: Does anyone here know how to make the non-X (pure terminal) resolution bigger?
i append a vga=MODE string to my kernel line in /boot/grub/menu.lst
kernel /boot/vmlinuz-2.6.10-5-386 root=/dev/hda1 ro quiet splash vga=0x0318
there are other ways, but i've found editing menu.lst to be the easiest
you could also look at svgatextmode
although I have little experience with that.
that'd be ok, if 0x0318 is the mode you want.
try 'sudo hwinfo --framebuffer' to see what your setup is capable of; mine is set for 1024x768
